topic.title: Help with Millchan
topic.body: I cannot see replies or images on millchan.  I can navigate to boards but cannot see its content.  Any help would be appreciated thanks!  :)

1571752607_1E8JhJj7ukAx8ukr1iwV4Qvgn3UZk.body:
> [pexo](#comment_168_1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC): Has it worked before? If so when did it stop working?What browser are you on? There have been reported issues with the old Firefox forks (icecat/iceweasel and similar).Can you post a thread/board that doesn't work?

It used to work months ago.  Just within past few months the boards just show up as grey.  I'll post a screenshot now.  1: https: //anonymousfiles.io/Kvbucy8J/   2: https: //anonymousfiles.io/tWYjAmM3/  Like even if I seed an entire board nothing will show.  If I click catalogue I can see what recent threads that have been started but not ever be able to see them.

> [edgelordofdecent](#comment_190_1PGTHAmvu7K2PM7qqfoKyWv69aJsAaJQp5): Try increasing your site storage limit.

I've increased it to as much as 300mb when seeding an entire board for experiment but to no avail.

> [orien3242](#comment_36_12LJsN6FdsNkS8EfiDYFyoPqZUnEibBJvP): you have to give it time to load all the posts. I don't normally boot into zeronet but when I do I have to wait like around 4-8 hours to see all posts from large volume sites like millchan. (mind you I go offline for months at a time and load zeronet off a usb portable hard drive on a machine that is 8 years old) [...]

I've left my computer on for 2 days and still same thing.  :(
